TopicTitle: Destroying Buildings within the SPH editor.

Articles.Content: I was building in the SPH and had Whack-a-Kerbal open and somehow started using it IN the SPH and somehow it managed to destroy the VAB whilst I was inside the SPH making a craft . I though it was interesting and thought I should let the people know.
That's what you get for cheating, cheater.
I destroyed two of the runway lights at the end of the runway (with a rover, by accident), can't seem to get them fixed.

I destroyed two of the runway lights at the end of the runway (with a rover, by accident), can't seem to get them fixed.

You mean you can't repair it? If you right click on the runway it should allow you to fix it... I did it once.

That's what you get for cheating, cheater.

Well, I was testing things. You'd have to have been there.
Guys, I don't even...what?! I don't know why but this blows my mind! XD

I destroyed two of the runway lights at the end of the runway (with a rover, by accident), can't seem to get them fixed.

This is actually a feature. Those durned lights are the bane of airplanes... I think I'll make a bomber and see if I can blow those stupid things up now...

Light of Airplane Slaying +5, +10 against broad-winged planes.

Guys, I don't even...what?! I don't know why but this blows my mind! XD

Seconded~ I'm amazed the inside of the SPH would actually have any sort of world-space coordinate to it..

If I had written it, it most certainly wouldn't have such a thing.

shrug

It's in the debug toolbox for a reason.

http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot16713_zpsint9keds.png

+10 respect for Squad.
